00034 template <class Product>
00035 class TSupplierCompWrap:
00036                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00037                      virtual public ISupplier,
00038                      virtual public IElapsedTimeProvider,
00039                      virtual public istd::IChangeable
00040 {
00041 public:
00042        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00043        typedef Product ProductType;
00044 
00045        enum MessageId
00046        {
00047               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00048        };
00049 
00050        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00051               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ISupplier);
00052               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IElapsedTimeProvider);
00053               I_ASSIGN(m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr, "DiagnosticName", "Name of this supplier for diagnostic, if it is not set, no diagnostic log message will be send", false, "");
00054               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsSetCompPtr, "ParamsSet", "Parameters set describing model parameter used to produce results", false, "ParamsSet");
00055               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_paramsSetModelCompPtr, m_paramsSetCompPtr, false);
00056               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr, "AdditionalTriggerInputs", "Additional observed trigger inputs, the supplier will be invalidated if some input signal the change", false);
00057        I_END_COMPONENT;
00058 
00059        TSupplierCompWrap();
00060 
00061        // reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00062        virtual void InvalidateSupplier();
00063        virtual void EnsureWorkInitialized();
00064        virtual void EnsureWorkFinished();
00065        virtual void ClearWorkResults();
00066        virtual int GetWorkStatus() const;
00067        virtual iprm::IParamsSet* GetModelParametersSet() const;
00068 
00069        // reimplemented (iproc::IElapsedTimeProvider)
00070        virtual double GetElapsedTime() const;
00071 
00072 protected:
00077        virtual bool InitializeWork();
00078 
00082        const Product* GetWorkProduct() const;
00083 
00089        virtual void RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00094        virtual void UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00095 
00096        // abstract methods
00101        virtual int ProduceObject(Product& result) const = 0;
00102 
00103        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00104        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00105        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00106 
00107        class InputObserver: public imod::CMultiModelObserverBase
00108        {
00109        public:
00110               InputObserver(TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* parentPtr);
00111 
00112               using imod::CMultiModelObserverBase::EnsureModelsDetached;
00113 
00114        protected:
00115               // reimplemented (imod::CMultiModelObserverBase)
00116               virtual void BeforeUpdate(imod::IModel* modelPtr, int updateFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr);
00117 
00118        private:
00119               TSupplierCompWrap<Product>& m_parent;

00123        I_ATTR(QString, m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr);
00124        I_REF(iprm::IParamsSet, m_paramsSetCompPtr);

00126        I_MULTIREF(imod::IModel, m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr);

00141 template <class Product>
00142 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::TSupplierCompWrap()
00143 :      m_workStatus(WS_INVALID),
00144        m_inputObserver(this),
00145        m_productChangeNotifier(NULL, CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS | CF_MODEL)
00146 {
00147 }

00150 // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00151 
00152 template <class Product>
00153 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InvalidateSupplier()
00154 {
00155        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00156               return;
00157        }
00158 
00159        m_elapsedTime = 0.0;
00160 
00161        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INVALID){
00162               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00163 
00164               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00165        }
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 template <class Product>
00170 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkInitialized()
00171 {
00172        if (m_workStatus < ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00173               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00174 
00175               if (InitializeWork()){
00176                      m_workStatus = WS_INIT;
00177               }
00178               else{
00179                      m_workStatus = WS_CRITICAL;
00180 
00181                      m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(NULL);
00182               }
00183        }
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 template <class Product>
00188 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00189 {
00190        if (m_workStatus <= ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00191               TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkInitialized();
00192 
00193               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00194 
00195               if (!m_productPtr.IsValid()){
00196                      m_productPtr.SetPtr(new Product());
00197               }
00198 
00199               QElapsedTimer timer;
00200               timer.start();
00201 
00202               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(*m_productPtr);
00203               I_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00204 
00205               m_elapsedTime = timer.nsecsElapsed() / 1000000000.0;
00206 
00207               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(NULL);
00208        }
00209 }
00210 
00211 
00212 template <class Product>
00213 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00214 {
00215        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00216               return;
00217        }
00218 
00219        m_elapsedTime = 0.0;
00220 
00221        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INVALID){
00222               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00223 
00224               m_productPtr.Reset();
00225 
00226               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00227        }
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 template <class Product>
00232 int TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkStatus() const
00233 {
00234        return m_workStatus;
00235 }
00236 
00237 
00238 template <class Product>
00239 iprm::IParamsSet* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetModelParametersSet() const
00240 {
00241        return m_paramsSetCompPtr.GetPtr();
00242 }

00248 double TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetElapsedTime() const

00254 // protected methods
00255 
00256 template <class Product>
00257 bool TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InitializeWork()
00258 {
00259        return true;
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 template <class Product>
00264 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00265 {
00266        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00267 
00268        if (m_workStatus == WS_OK){
00269               return m_productPtr.GetPtr();
00270        }
00271        else{
00272               return NULL;
00273        }
00274 }

00276 
00277 template <class Product>
00278 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00279 {
00280        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00281        modelPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00282 }
00283 
00284 
00285 template <class Product>
00286 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00287 {
00288        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00289        if (m_inputObserver.IsModelAttached(modelPtr)){
00290               modelPtr->DetachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00291        }
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00296 
00297 template <class Product>
00298 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentCreated()
00299 {
00300        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00301 
00302        if (m_paramsSetModelCompPtr.IsValid()){
00303               m_paramsSetModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00304        }
00305 
00306        int inputsCount = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr.GetCount();
00307        for (int i = 0; i < inputsCount; ++i){
00308               imod::IModel* inputModelPtr = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr[i];
00309               if (inputModelPtr != NULL){
00310                      RegisterSupplierInput(inputModelPtr);
00311               }
00312        }
00313 
00314        m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 template <class Product>
00319 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00320 {
00321        m_inputObserver.EnsureModelsDetached();
00322 
00323        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00324 }

00330 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InputObserver::InputObserver(TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* parentPtr)
00331 :      m_parent(*parentPtr)
00332 {
00333        I_ASSERT(parentPtr != NULL);
00334 }

00337 // protected methods of embedded class InputObserver

00339 // reimplemented (imod::CMultiModelObserverBase)
00340 
00341 template <class Product>
00342 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InputObserver::BeforeUpdate(imod::IModel* /*modelPtr*/, int /*updateFlags*/, istd::IPolymorphic* /*updateParamsPtr*/)
00343 {
00344        m_parent.InvalidateSupplier();
00345 }
